anyone in here who use vmware?: have you tried qemu? that's free software
well, it's not too hard. you should first run "qemu-img" to create an hard drive image... the syntax is "qemu-img create -f qcow filename maximumsize"

then you run "qemu imagefilename", and it starts. of course it won't do anything at that point, because there's no OS installed... but then just insert an OS cd-rom, and use "qemu -hdc -boot d imagefilename"
